hero.name: Omkarnath Dubey
hero.tagline: Building scalable, high-performance, and elegant web solutions for the enterprise.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a results-driven Frontend Developer with a passion for crafting pixel-perfect, accessible, and performant web applications. With a strong foundation in modern JavaScript frameworks and a keen eye for design, I transform complex requirements into seamless digital experiences. My approach blends technical expertise with a business-focused mindset to deliver software that scales.

items.title: Enterprise Dashboard UI
items.description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for large-scale data visualization, featuring real-time updates and customizable widgets.

items.title: E-Commerce Platform
items.description: A headless e-commerce frontend built for performance and SEO, integrating with Shopify API.

items.title: Corporate Banking Portal
items.description: Secure and accessible banking interface designed for high-net-worth individual management.

details: Led the migration of legacy monolith frontend to a modern micro-frontend architecture.
Improved site performance scores by 40% through code splitting and asset optimization.
Collaborated with UX designers to implement a new design system used across 5+ products.
Mentored junior developers and established code quality standards.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Available for freelance opportunities and full-time roles.
